title: Interpretation of a dream about finding things in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about finding things in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about finding things in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about finding things in a dream If one sees finding things in a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s bad nature and need to change. Seeing things in a dream may indicate The dream indicates bad events that may happen to the dreamer on those days. Seeing finding things in a dream may indicate abundant money that the dreamer may gain in his life during this time. If one sees that he found things in a dream, this may indicate good news for the dreamer and his good circumstances. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding paper money and receiving it in a dream. It is possible that the vision of finding banknotes in a dream indicates some differences and problems that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. Whoever sees in a dream that he finds a bank note, this indicates some Changes that may occur in the life of the dreamer during that period, and he must ask for God’s help. A dream about finding paper money in a dream may indicate fears that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. If you see yourself taking paper money in a dream, it may This indicates financial problems that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding blue banknotes and receiving them in a dream: Seeing yourself receiving blue banknotes in a dream may indicate the success and distinction that the dreamer enjoyed in his life during those days. Whoever dreams of blue paper money in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions are achieved to a great extent during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing blue paper money in a dream indicates that the dreamer seeks to achieve his goals and ambitions to a great extent. It is possible that it is a vision. Finding blue paper money in a dream indicates some good changes occurring in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about finding gold in the sea in a dream: Anyone who dreams of finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate great success that the dreamer may achieve. In his life at that time. Finding gold in the sea in a dream may indicate the challenges that the dreamer will face in those days, and God knows best. Anyone who dreams that they went to the sea and found gold in the dream may indicate the dreamer’s attempt to achieve desires and dreams. Vision Finding gold in the sea in a dream means getting rid of the problem that the dreamer was facing and the happy events that will come to him, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about finding a dead person in a dream: Whoever sees that he found a dead body in a dream can indicate the need for the deceased to receive many supplications during this period. Dreaming of finding a dead person in the dream that we know can indicate that the deceased needs mercy and prayers for him in an unusual way. If you see finding a dead person in a dream, this may indicate that you are facing some fears and problems in the dreamer’s life.

preview.html: Green apple Green apples are useful fruits, and seeing and eating green apples in a dream has many connotations, and it can bring good and it can also bring bad, and the interpretation of the vision varies according to the type and condition of the dreamer. Green apples in a dream Green apples in a dream belong to a man or a merchant and he sought to complete a business or project. Therefore, it is a sign of great achievements and goals from that project or trade. Seeing green apples in a dream can also indicate the greatness and greatness of the dreamer. Eating green apples in a dream is a sign of the collapse of worries, repayment of debts, a high status, and a decent and happy life, God willing. A vision appears Green apples represent the tenderness and beauty of the dreamer's heart. If a single man sees green apples in his dream, this is a warning that there is a disreputable girl who is trying to beautify him and attract him to her, and eating green apples is a sign that he will commit sins with her. To take care of those around him. And if the little girl tries to take an apple from the tree as evidence of the purity of her heart and the ease with which she can be deceived, then she must ask for God’s help, and beware of those around her who are trying to deceive her. If the dreamer gets married, this indicates the success of his married life, God willing. Green apples for individuals. The unmarried girl who sees Green apples in a dream show the softness and purity of her heart. Seeing a single girl peeling apples is evidence of her integrity and her distance from bad people who are trying to deceive in order to destroy her reputation. If they are yellow, this indicates that she should wait and plan her future well, be calm, and think more. When making her decisions, especially fatal decisions. Green apples for single people may be the right news for the husband. If an unmarried girl ate a green apple in her sleep and it was delicious, this indicates that the coming days will bring her goodness. And if the dreamer sees that she took a small part of the apple and did not She eats it, this indicates her haste in rejecting the suitor who was bringing her goodness. If an unmarried woman eats an apple and it is spoiled, this indicates the corruption of the person with whom she has a relationship, and his bad morals and intentions, but she is indifferent to all of this, because of her good heart and love for her. He carries. For this person. If an unmarried girl takes an apple from someone, this is a sign of this person’s kindness and this person will be the reason for her kindness. Some commentators believe that seeing an unmarried woman eating green apples in a dream may be a sign of her haste in judging people, and perhaps This girl fell into unseen misfortunes because of a fun, hypocritical person in her life. . And he manipulates her emotions until he gets what he wants. Green apples for a married woman. If the dreamer is truly happy with his married life, then seeing green apples in a dream is a sign of love, happiness and comfort in married life and that she is managing her married life well and satisfactorily for her and her husband. And if the wife is really angry with Her husband, this is a sign that someone is forcing her in an inappropriate way to do forbidden things, and that she has already drifted into the path of sin and doubt. And if she is trying to live with her married life and there is

title: Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash according to Ibn Sirin and a dream about a plane crash in front of me

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a plane crash: Seeing a plane falling from the sky is one of the famous visions of our time, and the interpreters at that time mentioned many associations and symbols that express the optimal interpretation of it from all sides. Perhaps the multiplicity of indicators is due to the difference in vision from one person to another, as well as many Of things, such as where the plane fell and the impact resulting from its fall, was it just a normal fall or did it have defects and catastrophic results. ? We will explain all the signs that the plane symbolizes in general, and what it means to see it falling in particular. Dream Interpretation of a Plane CrashThe plane indicates the ceiling of noble ambitions that others do not have, great hopes and a deep-rooted desire to move forward and achieve all the goals that the owner of the vision had planned in the past It also indicates success, achieving the goal, and hard work to reach the end of the road and reap the fruits of one’s efforts. The large plane symbolizes the projects undertaken by the dreamer and bring him huge profits, business deals, and investments that will lead him to a much better situation than he was in, while the small plane symbolizes To simple projects, such as small projects of large size. return. If he sees that he is on the plane, this indicates that the situation has changed and the situation has changed for the better, and he is traveling to bring the results of his work and fulfill his desires. Looking at the plane while flying is often evidence of living in a world of illusions, indulging in dreams, and the desire to be liberated and break out of the mold. Which does not suit the viewer. The fall of the plane symbolizes the indicator that the fortuneteller follows to find out what succeeded and what failed. The fall is like the stock market in terms of gains and losses. The fall symbolizes collapse, a change in situation, and failure to achieve what is desired, but it is a fall followed by fluctuations and success. The fall of the plane shows the high status that The dreamer has reached it and the successes he has achieved. The vision may indicate permanent failure, numerous attempts, and a serious search to reach the top, and these efforts will be followed by achieving the desired in the end. The plane symbolizes steadfastness of will, perseverance, and patience. If the plane crashes, it shows excessive stress, and a bad psychological state, And a tendency to lose hope, resort to isolation, and start thinking again, making alternative plans, setting priorities, and re-planning how to reach the dream. If the dreamer sees a plane crash, this means that he hears bad news and is exposed to many problems and permanent tendencies that others do not appreciate. Or they give him the right to the effort he makes. The plane falling without exploding is evidence of bad things done by the fortuneteller and complex issues for which he cannot find a solution. At the appropriate time, and with reconsideration and delay, the fortuneteller reaches his goal, his condition, and his relationship with God. And men will improve. If the kite burns when it falls, this indicates the conflict that is taking place inside it and the fire that will not be extinguished until the source of this ignition is completely eliminated. If it is the kite that falls, this indicates weakness.

title: Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant? Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant in a dream is interpreted with many meanings according to the type of newborn and whether the dreamer suffered during childbirth or not? And in order to discover more interpretations of this dream, you must follow the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. Wait .. Google is an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant If the dreamer recently discovered that she is barren and will not give birth and began to dream of many children and childbirth, this is a self-talk that stems from her great desire for pregnancy and motherhood, and an important thing must be mentioned, which is that supplication changes the purpose, meaning that if the dreamer is actually barren, and her pregnancy is a will, it is difficult, even impossible in the eyes of doctors, but impossible with God. As for if the dreamer is newly married and dreams that she is pregnant and gives birth to a beautiful girl, this indicates pregnancy in reality, and if she dreams that she was wearing gold earrings during her birth in a dream, the vision expresses pregnancy in a boy. If you see that she was suffering from pregnancy in a dream and when she gave birth she felt happy and comfortable, here the dream shows the fatigue and many problems that she is immersed in and will come out of them and relieve her from God. Come to her soon. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his books on the interpretation of dreams that the symbol of childbirth indicates a happy life and beautiful days that the dreamer will live in her life as follows: Or not: Whoever was poor and her relationship with her husband was about to disappear due to poverty and lack of money and dreamed that she was giving birth, and the pain of pregnancy went away in the dream and she breathed a sigh of relief, this symbolizes the end of poverty and the arrival of abundant money. Second: A woman who was afflicted with an illness in her life and this illness affected her marital life and now feels cold in her relationship with her husband. Third: The birth sign of a married woman interested in work and success in her work indicates that she will rise to a high position and enjoy a prestigious professional status. The most important interpretations of seeing childbirth in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant Interpretation of a caesarean section in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant Jurists said that a caesarean section is an important symbol in a dream and indicates a decisive decision that the dreamer must make soon to save herself from a problem that has been presented to her for some time. Some commentators said that a caesarean section means the emergence of marital crises and problems in the dreamer's life, and her relationship with her husband may be affected by these crises. Sometimes the dreamer may dream of a caesarean section because of her fear of this birth as a result of the bad background she knows. Interpretation of the birth of a boy in a dream for a married woman Giving birth to a child in a dream is one of the bad symbols and jurists agreed that it warns the dreamer of harm, damage and many problems in her life and it will be financially difficult and perhaps the dream indicates illness and a feeling of sadness and lethargy in the coming days, even if this boy suffers from a physical illness or a disability in his arm or leg or a disability. Any other place on the body interprets the scene worse and indicates

title: Interpretation of praying in the Haram in a dream

preview.html: Imad al-Din's supplication? Therefore, the encyclopedia provides an interpretation of praying in the Haram in a dream. It is obligatory for the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - to pray on the night of the night journey and the ascension, and God Almighty made it fifty prayers during the day and night, except for the chosen ones. The Messenger asked him to reduce it. Until he reached only five prayers during the day and night, and the chosen Prophet even made the prayer between the Muslim and the infidel. Whoever abandons it, his Islam is not complete, and the Messenger also made it one of the pillars of his religion. He is the one who established the religion, and whoever demolishes it destroys the religion, and the shrines of Mecca and Medina are among the greatest places on the face of the earth where the servant gains many, many rewards in one prayer. Let us learn together about the interpretation of praying in the Sanctuary.Interpretation of praying in the Sanctuary in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a man praying in the SanctuaryAnd if a person sees prayer in his dream, this is a good omen for that person in demonstrating his righteousness and piety, but whoever sees in a dream that he is praying in the Sanctuary. This is evidence that this man had long wanted to go to visit the Sacred House of God, but the material and moral circumstances did not allow it, and after seeing this, Almighty God will grant this man success in going on the Hajj to Jerusalem. The House of God, and if a man sees in a dream that he has not done so, he can go to pray in the sanctuary. This is evidence of his financial inability to perform the Hajj obligation, and if he sees in a dream that people are praying in the Haram, and he is only watching them without compensation, this is evidence that this man is not performing the prayers that God Almighty has imposed on him. This is an indication that this person should approach Almighty God. So that he does not regret what will happen to him in his life and after his death. Because man is closer to God. The closer a person is to Him, the farther away He is from God. Almighty God turned away from; So see who you want to be! Interpretation of seeing praying in the sanctuary while you are single. When an unmarried woman sees praying in her dream; This is evidence that this girl performs the entire obligatory prayer during her hours without missing a single beat, and this also brings this girl closer to God. Therefore, God Almighty will make it easy for her in every difficult situation that she will face in her life, and if she sees a single woman holding her hand to go to the temple. This is evidence that this girl will be blessed by God Almighty to marry a righteous man and this man will take her to visit God’s holy house and pray in the sanctuary. Until her longing is fulfilled, and if a woman sees in a dream that people are praying, and she is the only one who is not praying in the sanctuary, this is evidence that this girl is falling short of her Lord and that this girl must return and repent to her Lord. May God guide her in the deeds that make her life happy. Interpretation of seeing prayer in the sanctuary for a married woman: If a married woman sees praying in the temple, this is evidence of God’s goodness and blessing for her with her money, her husband, and her child, and if a married woman sees that she is praying in a dream with her. Her husband. This is evidence of the religious commitment of her and her husband, and that they want to perform the prayers on time, but if a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying alone and that her husband is only watching her

title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: He brings cats as pets, which adults and children love, but when it comes to the dreamer in his sleep, especially if this vision is repeated more than once, the dreamer can get confused. When he discovers the science of dream interpretation, scientists were able to interpret this vision as follows: In the event that the woman sees a white cat in This dream indicates that this woman is being deceived by someone. If the cat in the dream is weak, this indicates that the dreamer was a victim of someone’s exploitation. Many scholars have indicated that seeing cats in a dream, in general, indicates problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. If the fortune-teller is a woman and sees a cat in her dream, this indicates the presence of a thief in that woman’s life. Regardless of the woman’s seeing a cat in a dream, it shows a large number of demons in her place. If the dreamer sees a beautiful and beautiful cat in his dream, this indicates that this fortune-teller has internal and external beauty that affects whoever deals with him. If the dreamer sees a black cat in his dream... this indicates that things are revolving around him, especially magical and worldly works... the jinn. And demons are embodied in the form of cats and words in a dream. Seeing a cat in a dream, such as: If a married woman dreams of having a cat in bed, this means that her husband is cheating on her with another woman who is cheating on him. This is an indication that someone is spying on his life and wants to know everything about him, and that this person is harmful. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that there is a group of cats sitting in front of his house and screaming. This indicates that there is a group of thieves hiding in his house, intending to rob him. When you see that there is a cat living in his house, this indicates that there is a lot of goodness in this fortuneteller’s house. title: Interpretation of kicking a horse in a dream: A horse kicks me in a dream

preview.html: I dream of a horse kicking a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, if the horse kicks me at home. Kicking a white horse Black coffee by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq Seeing a horse kicking in a dream: Seeing a horse in a dream is one of the beautiful and happy dreams that indicate happiness and psychological comfort in general, especially if it is a white horse in the dream. Interpretation of kicking a horse in a dream Seeing a horse kicking in a dream indicates On the disobedience of children and their bad behavior towards you. Whoever sees a horse kicking in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s laziness and neglect in performing his duties and his failure to do the things that he was supposed to do for the sake of his family and his work. Seeing a horse kicking in a dream means that the dreamer must make more effort. In performing his duties in order to correct his obstructed affairs. Kicking a horse in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer some material and financial losses. If the dreamer sees that a horse has kicked him in a dream, this means that he is envied, and that there are those who have enmity and jealousy towards him, and they are people close to him. Kicking a horse in a dream means that the dreamer will experience emotional trauma, betrayal, or misjudgment from a person who seemed special to him, but he found it to be the opposite. A dreamer who sees a horse kicking in his dream means that he will be betrayed by people close to him. Kicking a horse in a dream means that there are a lot of... Bad words said about you. Whoever sees that a horse is kicking him in a dream, this means that his friends are false and have two faces. Kicking a horse in a dream means that the dreamer is in the middle of entering into a relationship, engagement, or marriage, but unfortunately this will be a wrong decision and he will discover the opposite when it is too late. A horse in a dream means that the dreamer will be subjected to fraud from trusted people from whom he was not expecting. Seeing a horse in a dream is a sign of goodness, highness, and dominance for the dreamer, as well as his high status and high status. Also, seeing it means pride, dignity, and honour. A brown horse is Victory, victory, or livelihood. Interpretation of a horse in a dream. Whoever dreams that he is riding a horse with elaborate decorations, this means that he will obtain honour, honour, high status and honor against enemies. Whoever sees in his dream that he is watching a horse from afar, this indicates good and abundant food, blessings and giving. If a person dreams that he He rides a horse and tries to stop it, then this indicates that he has committed sin and misdeeds. And if he dreams that he is drinking horse milk, then this indicates the dreamer’s pride and chivalry. Seeing a horse, horse, pony, or mare in a dream is something that indicates conquest, dignity, sublimity, and control. Therefore, the majority of the dreams mentioned above indicate the dreamer’s good news of glory and rising status. Ibn Sirin mentioned his interpretations and explanations regarding this matter: Whoever dreams that he is riding on the back of a horse and trying to restrain it, then this is interpreted as the dreamer following his desires and being one of the sinners. Whoever sees a horse riding a horse and the horses spreading their wings and flying, this is good news for the dreamer. Whoever sees a horse or a mare dying or... If she is dying in front of him or in his house, this indicates...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of Ibn Sirin’s breast?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of the breast for a woman or a man has many meanings, but the first thing we need to know is whether the milk fell on the ground or if there is a child breastfeeding this milk, so we will quote all the interpreters’ sayings about the dream of milk falling. The breast of a married woman, a widow, a pregnant woman, or an unmarried girl. Interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of the breast. What is the interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of the breast? Interpretation scholars said that this dream has many positive connotations. The release of milk expresses the abundance of food that the dreamer obtains through halal means, and since the milk is white, it is considered good news of hope and optimism in the coming days. Some scholars said that whoever lives his life trying to support his family and fulfill its obligations indicates that seeing milk coming out of his chest is... A generous and charismatic person performs his role to the fullest. However, if the milk falls on the ground, it is wasteful spending, and the viewer must be careful to put the money where it is due without exaggeration and waste. Of course, only a married woman secretes milk from her breasts after giving birth, but if she sees... The girl also has this dream, as this is a good omen for her, that joy, happiness, and the fulfillment of her hopes and dreams. The vision expresses getting rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer went through in the last period and was greatly affected psychologically by negativity. What is the interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of the breast according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said If the dreamer is a man and has money or trade, he should be happy with this dream. He makes a lot of profits after making many profitable deals that put him in the ranks of major traders. But if he is a young man and wants to communicate with a certain girl and finds it difficult to propose to her due to the lack of money and high social status, then the dream indicates the imminent fulfillment of his desire to marry her, After he could. In obtaining a prestigious job that brings him a lot of money that allows him to marry her. In the event that the dreamer did not have a child in the previous years of his marriage, and this deprivation greatly affected himself and his relationship with his wife, then the dream is good news for him that the wife is carrying a child in her stomach. . After receiving the reasons and receiving appropriate treatment for their condition. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site... You will find everything you are looking for. Dream interpretation of milk coming out of the breast for a single woman. A girl’s dream of milk coming out of her breasts is considered a good sign of her ability to Achieving the impossible or what she once thought was impossible. If she studies at a certain academic stage, she will achieve excellence and success in her studies, making it necessary for her to be a source of pride for all her family members. But if she has recently gone through a failed emotional experience, she will not continue in Feeling sad or frustrated because of her emotional failure and will look forward, ignoring what was yesterday, so that she can achieve her desires and aspirations. It has also been said that the girl who does not find happiness in her current life and feels a lot of unhappiness for various reasons. She may be beautiful, but no one proposes to him

title: Swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Therefore, we will discuss through this article to talk about the interpretation of swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and you have more interpretations from a translated site, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing swimming in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is swimming, and in the dream she has a lot of water next to her, and she feels afraid. It appears that she will get rid of some of the conflicts she is experiencing at this time in her life and live comfortably. Seeing an unmarried girl looking at the water in a dream and trying to swim but she cannot in the dream explains that she is suffering from something that is happening in her life at the moment and she is afraid of it. severely and she needs to stay away from him. The unmarried dreamer who sees that she is swimming in a dream for a long time, and feels happy. It indicates that she will encounter in her life a lot of kindness and nourishment, and she will bathe in intense work in her life, and God knows best. The unmarried dreamer saw in the dream that she was She is swimming in a dream, and with a stranger in the dream. It indicates that in the coming period she will marry a good and righteous man and she will be happy in her life, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a rough sea and high waves. Interpretation of watching swimming in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is swimming for a long time Very happy in a dream. It indicates that she will have a lot of money and goodness in her life and will improve her affairs, God willing. And if the married woman who is dreaming looks at the water in the dream, and dares, to swim in it in the dream, and feels fear. This indicates a new and difficult problem for her. For her who will enter this period and will overcome all difficulties, God willing. A married woman swimming in a dream feels happy in the dream, and she gave birth to her children swimming next to her in a dream, an indication that she will live a long period of happiness and comfort with her children and husband, God willing, and God knows best. And a married woman who sees that Her husband was swimming with another woman in a dream, and she looked at them sadly. This is an indication that she thinks a lot about her husband, and is trying not to shorten her life with him during this time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing swimming in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she can swim in a dream By herself without the help of anyone. It indicates that she will overcome all the difficulties in her life and the problems she is experiencing during this period, and God knows best. And if a divorced woman looks at the water in a dream and feels extreme fear of swimming in the dream. It is interpreted that she will get rid of all the problems that she faces. She is experiencing this period of her time, and God is Most High and Knowing. What if a divorced woman swam with her ex-husband in a dream, and felt very happy with him in the water. This indicates that she will return to him again and live with him in great happiness, away from problems and bad things. As for the divorced woman, she sees... In a dream, she could not swim in the dream, and she was drowning in the dream a lot. She explained that during this time she would face many major conflicts in her life and would suffer from this problem. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about swimming with

title: Learn the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of extracting teeth, the interpretation of the dream of extracting front teeth in a dream, and the interpretation of the dream of extracting teeth by hand

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction Tooth extraction is one of the disturbing dreams that cause anxiety for the viewer and steal sleep from his eyes, but nevertheless it carries in its interpretations many good tidings, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing molars, front teeth and lower teeth for single, married and pregnant women in the language of Ibn Sirin and senior scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction? Tooth extraction in a dream indicates a way out of a difficult crisis only if the teeth are damaged, black or ugly, but if they are healthy, this may indicate a loss of money. If the dreamer is a merchant, the vision indicates that he will lose a lot of his money through a business deal that he will make soon. The vision indicates the loss of opportunities, the loss of benefits, and separation from relatives and loved ones. It also shows that the dreamer will separate from his life partner and will suffer a lot because of that. The dream also indicates that the dreamer's age is older than the age of his relatives. As for removing the fangs, it shows a big problem that will happen to the head of the dreamer's family, but if he sees that he is pulling out his teeth and then they fall into his arms, this foretells that he will have males if he marries and marries a beautiful and fair woman in his life, if he is single. The dream indicates the severing of the womb and the corruption of the dreamer's morals. It was also said that it indicates that the dreamer will spend all his money on treatment and recovery from his illness and then recover this money. From his work when he heals. What is the interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the dream indicates the loss of something valuable or the death of someone close to the dreamer, and it can also indicate his separation from his life partner or the loss of a friend. Seeing blood oozing from the teeth while they are being extracted is an indication of the nearest date of birth for a woman known to the dreamer. The birth of a beautiful child brings an atmosphere of joy to his family home. If the dreamer is facing some financial problems and is unable to pay his debts, the dream indicates that he will be able to pay them off soon, and his mind will be at peace and his eyes will be approved after this burden is removed from his burden. Shoulders. If he extracts his tooth without pain, this indicates that his difficult days will end and his happy and comfortable days will begin in which he gets everything he wants and God (Almighty) compensates him for everything he lost. You have a dream that confuses you, wait for it .. Google Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about tooth extraction for unmarried women Tooth extraction in a dream for a single woman indicates feelings of sadness and disappointment in the current period, and an indication that they are facing difficulty in making decisions due to the thoughts of despair and fear that control them. The vision serves as a notice to relax a little and do meditation exercises and try to ignore the negative feelings that delay their progress. The vision indicates an emotional shock that the dreamer was exposed to in the past due to falling in love with someone who does not suit her, but she cannot forget him and overcome her feelings towards him despite the long period that has passed since the end of their relationship. Together from. The dream suggests that she has been wronged by a member of her family and cannot forgive him, although she pretends to overcome the issue and forgive him.
